value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick talks about Power BI Desktop and role-playing dimensions. Can you even do this in Power BI Desktop? value.title: Power BI parameters - Updating in the Power BI Service or with APIs

Then you can update those Power BI parameters once the report is published to the Power BI service.  PowerShell Samples:

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Sort By A Measure Not Shown In Visual
